message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $9,500. I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $7,500 is significantly below its true value. This product offers unique advantages and its quality surpasses similar products in the market. How about we meet in the middle at $8,750?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not convinced that $8,750 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $8,250. Can you consider that?
